ygData.subject: Re: Um actully i got items
ygData.msgSnippet: I feel this is best roleplayed in the view of my dwarf: </roleplay on> We gots a word fer what yer talkin abou . I believe that word be, well I
ygData.messageBody:
I feel this is best roleplayed in the view of my
dwarf: </roleplay on><br><br>We gots a word fer
what yer talkin' abou'. I believe that word be, well I
can't be sayin' it 'ere. Ya be tryin' ta scam folks, so
bugger off! None o' tha walkers o' tha way would ever
ask ya ta send yer station name an' password
anywhere, certainly not ta any email address that don't
belong ta tha master company, an' that bein' Sony, tha
silly elves they is.<br><br>Don' be peddlin' yer crap
aroun' 'ere. We don' want it, an' we're smarter than ya
think. If you folks want me own opinion, this 'ere crud
monkey fella be tha same sludge that posted tha request
fer yer passwords an' such.<br><br>Tha processes
described in tha post jus' don' fit wit' anythin' I've ever
'eard of in tha workin's of tha company. <br><br>Let me
repeat meself: Bugger off!<br><br></roleplay
off><br><br>Snarff Aleguzzler<br>Paladin of Brell
